alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Daniels, northern Roosevelt and southwestern Sheridan Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles east of Bredette, or 25 miles southeast of Scobey, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Scobey, Medicine Lake, Froid, Flaxville, Bredette, Redstone, Archer, Madoc, Reserve, Homestead and Navajo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
